JOB DESCRIPTION: Company Description   MarkTeQ stands on three different strong foundations i.e. Technology, Management and e-Marketing. Our company assures to provide its outstanding expertise in the field of technology, top-level management services and excellent e-Marketing skills. These services are exclusively managed by our highly dedicated, dynamic and customer-focused personnel.     Job Description    Job Description:     MarkTeQ is seeking a candidate for the Web/Software Developer Position. Knowledge of C# and MSSQL are required.  Candidate should be dedicated and hard working with coding.     Skills Preferred:     - Should be well versed in C#, ASP.net, MVC and SQL and its trends - Should be familiar with Database design and implementation, Windows Software Development, Web Development. - Knowledge in Java Script, ASP.net, MS SQL, and Reporting preferred - Knowledge to work on PHP, Wordpress open source CMS system. - Good with communications. - Ability to work independently as well as in a team        Qualifications   Any Graduates     Additional Information    Experience: 0 - 6 Months      I'm interested
